items.title: Chains
items.blurb: An open-world game where you explore a whole world suspended in the sky, completing missions and discovering your past

items.title: Monkey C Monkey Do
items.blurb: Stranded on islands, you make your way to the GLORIOUS banana island!. Recruiting fellow stranded monkeys along the way!

items.title: Emmett
items.blurb: A Game made during the 1 week Brackeys 2022 game jam, where you solve puzzles through the use of Emmett's shadows.
